channel.title: Creative Archive
channel.description: Don't miss out on novelties from The Creative Archive!

item.title: Hastefulll
item.description:
About Hastefulll Hastefulll is a simple 7-level puzzle platformer about trying to leave a mark everywhere. However, you hurry so much everywhere that often you cannot go back to where you were before! Fill the board, but plan wisely. Haste makes waste!
How to playControls - keyboard Dash horizon...

item.title: Hall of Fame
item.description: Hall of fame: winners of Pedro PSI's challenges.

item.title: Play Mini Gemini Replay (PMGRP)
item.description:
About Play Mini Gemini Replay (PMGRP) Play Mini Gemini Replay (PMGRP) is a mini puzzle platformer about cooperating with your future self to reach your goals. Plan your limited moves wisely, play and replay all 11 levels!
How to playControls - keyboard Play mode Move with the Arrow keys. When th...

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
In connection to your use of the Creative Archive, you agree to be exclusively responsible to protect your own privacy. Otherwise you must cease to use the Creative Archive. Nevertheless, the Creative Archive is designed to minimise privacy risks. Here's how!

item.title: Whirlpuzzle
item.description:
About Whirlpuzzle Find a path to the goal, by rotating the puzzle to displace obstacles and reach inacessible locations! Beware, whirling too much will only confuse you... Can you solve all 7 levels? Good luck!
How to playControls - keyboard The goal is marked by an X. Move your avatar by pressi...

item.title: Viking Carpet - Gold over Red
item.description: Over a dark red background, golden patterns: diagonal lines of geometric cereal surrounding either an eight petal flower, or a diamond with four squares inside. The cereal lines would meet at a cross. This pattern was found on a viking carpet on display at the Norsk Folkemuseum in Oslo.
